movie.title: The Medallion
movie.description_intro: Eddie, an indomitable Hong Kong cop, is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers after a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion. Eddie enlists the help of British Interpol agent Nicole to determine the secret of the medallion and face down the evil Snakehead who wants to use its magical powers for his own nefarious plans.
movie.description_full: Eddie, an indomitable Hong Kong cop, is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers after a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion. Eddie enlists the help of British Interpol agent Nicole to determine the secret of the medallion and face down the evil Snakehead who wants to use its magical powers for his own nefarious plans.

movies.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
movies.summary: Two Puerto Rican NYPD detectives head to Paris to track down a stolen handbag.
movies.description_full: Two Puerto Rican NYPD detectives head to Paris to track down a stolen handbag.
movies.synopsis: Two Puerto Rican NYPD detectives head to Paris to track down a stolen handbag.

movies.title: The Program
movies.summary: An Irish sports journalist becomes convinced that Lance Armstrong's performances during the Tour de France victories are fueled by banned substances. With this conviction, he starts hunting for evidence that will expose Armstrong.
movies.description_full: An Irish sports journalist becomes convinced that Lance Armstrong's performances during the Tour de France victories are fueled by banned substances. With this conviction, he starts hunting for evidence that will expose Armstrong.
movies.synopsis: An Irish sports journalist becomes convinced that Lance Armstrong's performances during the Tour de France victories are fueled by banned substances. With this conviction, he starts hunting for evidence that will expose Armstrong.

movies.title: Sabrina
movies.summary: Maira lives happily with Aiden, a doll maker and toy company owner. But Vanya, their adopted daughter and Aiden's niece, is still dealing with the loss of her birth mother. After Vanya plays Charlie's Pencil to summon her late mother, strange things begin to happen. Maira is terrorized by the Sabrina doll. What is happening with the doll and what does it want?

movies.title: The Barge People
movies.summary: Four fellas take a barge n explore the canals in the rural side. Unknown to them that tons of toxic waste and hazardous chemicals have been dumped in the water by multinational companies which has caused genetic mutations among some people who have resorted to cannibalism.
